name: Histacom
description:
THIS VERSION OF HISTACOM IS NO LONGER BEING DEVELOPED AND IS NOW OBSOLETE. A NEW DEVELOPER OF THE PROJECT ADVERTISES THE GAME HERE: http://histacom.jamierocks.uk/

Histacom 1.87.1

Histacom is a game coded in VB.NET in which you play a hacker in the mid 1990′s and time travel into the future, using different Operating Systems along the way!

Hack you way through 5 Windows operating systems as you work to save the world from different sources of evil.

The Current Operating Systems Available for Game Play Are:

  1. Windows 95
  2. Windows 98
  3. Windows ME (2000)
  4. Windows XP
  5. Windows Vista (in development)
